pr_title: [JBPM-9094] Add the ability to specify an CaseId Expression and Sequence Name / Case Prefix Expression

timeline.message:
[JBPM-9094] Add the ability to specify an CaseId Expression and Sequence Name / Case Prefix Expression

adding expression support for case Id and prefix

timeline.body:


timeline.body: Just curious, is this backward-compatible in case somebody implemented its own generator? It is possible to set it either directly in jBPM or through the ServiceLoader in CaseKieServerExtension in KIE Server.
timeline.bodyText: Just curious, is this backward-compatible in case somebody implemented its own generator? It is possible to set it either directly in jBPM or through the ServiceLoader in CaseKieServerExtension in KIE Server.
timeline.bodyHTML: Just curious, is this backward-compatible in case somebody implemented its own generator? It is possible to set it either directly in jBPM or through the ServiceLoader in CaseKieServerExtension in KIE Server.
timeline.author: MarianMacik

replies.bodyText:
This is under discussion with the field.
In we go this way there is no other way to know which prefix belongs to which deployments as prefix will be dynamic. So this is fine to break backward compatitibliy.
replies.author: elguardian

timeline.body:
Add a new test, similar to previous one with 
`data.put("IS_PREFIX_SEQUENCE", null);`
and `caseDefinitionId: EmptyCaseWithCaseIdPrefix4`

There are 2 null pointer exceptions, at _marshal/unmarshal_ methods of **CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy** class, that could be avoided by checking 

- dataEntry.getValue() != null https://github.com/kiegroup/jbpm/blob/778e63a718fcc0960f01ff48b196af2d4b031ede/jbpm-case-mgmt/jbpm-case-mgmt-impl/src/main/java/org/jbpm/casemgmt/impl/marshalling/CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy.java#L144

- serializedContent.getContent() != null
https://github.com/kiegroup/jbpm/blob/778e63a718fcc0960f01ff48b196af2d4b031ede/jbpm-case-mgmt/jbpm-case-mgmt-impl/src/main/java/org/jbpm/casemgmt/impl/marshalling/CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy.java#L187

Wdyt?
timeline.bodyText:
Add a new test, similar to previous one with
data.put("IS_PREFIX_SEQUENCE", null);
and caseDefinitionId: EmptyCaseWithCaseIdPrefix4
There are 2 null pointer exceptions, at marshal/unmarshal methods of CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy class, that could be avoided by checking


dataEntry.getValue() != null 
  
    
      jbpm/jbpm-case-mgmt/jbpm-case-mgmt-impl/src/main/java/org/jbpm/casemgmt/impl/marshalling/CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy.java
    
    
         Line 144
      in
      778e63a
    
    
    
    

        
          
           if (marshaller.accept(dataEntry.getValue())) { 
        
    
  




serializedContent.getContent() != null

  
    
      jbpm/jbpm-case-mgmt/jbpm-case-mgmt-impl/src/main/java/org/jbpm/casemgmt/impl/marshalling/CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy.java
    
    
         Line 187
      in
      778e63a
    
    
    
    

        
          
           Object value = marshaller.unmarshal(context, is, serializedContent.getContent(), classloader); 
        
    
  




Wdyt?
timeline.bodyHTML:
Add a new test, similar to previous one with
data.put("IS_PREFIX_SEQUENCE", null);
and caseDefinitionId: EmptyCaseWithCaseIdPrefix4

There are 2 null pointer exceptions, at marshal/unmarshal methods of CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy class, that could be avoided by checking

  • dataEntry.getValue() != null

    jbpm/jbpm-case-mgmt/jbpm-case-mgmt-impl/src/main/java/org/jbpm/casemgmt/impl/marshalling/CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy.java

    Line 144 in 778e63a

    if (marshaller.accept(dataEntry.getValue())) {

  • serializedContent.getContent() != null

    jbpm/jbpm-case-mgmt/jbpm-case-mgmt-impl/src/main/java/org/jbpm/casemgmt/impl/marshalling/CaseFileInstanceMarshallingStrategy.java

    Line 187 in 778e63a

    Object value = marshaller.unmarshal(context, is, serializedContent.getContent(), classloader);

Wdyt?
timeline.author: gmunozfe

replies.bodyText: null is not really a valid input. so it does not really make sense.
replies.author: elguardian
